transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji boliye.
Executive: Hello. Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu very good evening aapne abhi call kiya tha.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Ji sir kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Mere ko teen char mahine ho gaye hai.
Executive: Kafi baar aap ji main dekh rahi hu aap pe kafi baar aap.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hanji ji sir bataiye kya bol rahe hai.
Customer: Ek bhi lead convert nahi hui abhi tak char mahine panch mahine ho gaye mere ko na kisi ka call aaya ek bande ka bhi.
Executive: Lead dikhti hai catalog par?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Catalog par leads to dikhti hai na jab aap catalog apna open karte ho to waha par aapko.
Customer: Ha wo just no.
Executive: No lead lead to dikhti hai wo just no pe aata hai na us pe click karta hai to expiry batata hai.
Customer: Expiry batata hai?
Customer: Ha just no pe aata hai to expiry batata hai us pe.
Executive: Nahi expiry kaise bata deta hai sir aap jab aapke pass by lead aati hogi tab.
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Jab aapke pass by lead aati hogi aap tabhi jate honge na sir waha par tabhi aap click karte honge.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Jaise hamare pass by lead aati.
Customer: Ji bataiye sir kya bol rahe ho.
Customer: Main bol raha hu just no aati hai na to is pe click karta hu to expire ho jati hai.
Executive: Sir ek second rukiye.
Executive: Accha. To jaise aap click karte ho to expire ho jati hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji ek second rukiye.
Customer: All over India deal karte ho sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Marble slabs marble wash basin white marble Vietnam white marble finger fountain stone wall foundation decorative foundation 50 ek lakh ke upar ka order chahiye hoga aapko right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek lakh 50000.
Executive: Sir lekin yaha pe by list to aapke pass GST verified by list bhi aapke pass show kar raha hai aap pe wash basin mein baat karu na.
Executive: Show kar raha hai GST verified hai 1000 piece ki hai more than one CR ke upar ka hi aapka order hai aap hi ke catalog pe main ye bata rahi hu theek hai then yaha pe ek by list show kar raha hai important marble wash basin theek hai ye ek piece ki to aap isko rehne de sakte ho kyuki ye koi itni badi by list nahi hai aapki to yaha pe main agar thoda aur niche scroll down karti hu sir to yaha pe aur bhi kafi sari by list yaha pe aapke pass ek chote se marble karke dikh raha hai ki show kar raha hai ek lakh ka order value hai iska to by list to show kar raha hai na yaha pe ab conversion ka agar aap mere ko bata rahe ho to waha par aap jab bhi IndiaMART apna open karte ho to waha par na aapke pass filters aate honge kafi sare upar.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: By list ke filter aate honge sir waha pe kafi sare upar aap ek kaam kar sakte ho sir google meet ka main aapko link share karunga aap join kar mere mere ko bilkul nahi karna hai.
Customer: Das baar to kar chuka hu main.
Executive: To sir main wahi to yaha pe samjha rahi hu na main mere ko samajhna hi nahi mere ko nahi samajhna hai main pareshan ho gaya main call karte karte bas main google meet karna hai wo karna hai aisa karna hai falana karna hai 10-10 din laga rakhe ho aap mere ko to kuch bhi nahi hai mere ko return refund ka hai wo masla hai wo kar do mere.
Executive: Sir refund ke liye hum refund to possible hi nahi hai na sir aap nahi mere ko bola hai abhi aap maine maine baat maine baat ki thi unhone bola ki aap try kar lo uske baad aapko refund ho jayega maine helpline number pe call kiya tha maine.
Executive: Sir refund ka to koi possible hi chances hi nahi hai koi refund to hota hi nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi main hota hai main hota hai.
Executive: Nahi hota hai sir jo makrana mein bahut hai makrana mein bahut kiya hai wo friend logo ne liya hai refund.
Executive: Sir agar kisi ko refund mila hoga na to usko return mein likh ke diya gaya hoga I mean matlab client ko aapne jab liya hoga aapko kuch return mein likh ke diya tha ki agar aapko business nahi milega to aap refund le lena apna.
Customer: Likhne ki nahi thodi stem thodi baat hui thi usme dekhna padega usme mere ko.
Executive: Dusri baat sir dekhiye do cheez yaha par hai dusri baat ye ki aapke catalog par GST verified by list bhi show kar raha hai ab main kaise aapko refund kara du aap khud batao mujhe agar aapke catalog pe bilkul bhi by list show na.
Customer: Call kisi ko call karta hu main to waha turant bolte hai ki theek hai sir main baad mein baat karta hu wo call kar karte hai uske baad mein koi reply wagera kuch bhi nahi aata iska.
Executive: Client ka.
Customer: Ji. Aap GST verified by list consume kijiye na waha par jisme samne promote kar raha hai.
Customer: To usme lead aayegi tab karunga na main GST wo hoga na.
Customer: Ek do baar try bhi kiya unko bhi to unka bhi koi respond nahi aaya par adhiktar koi wo thodi aayega GST wo GST wala banda thodi aayega.
Executive: Lekin wahi cheez hai sir aap refund ke bare mein aap bol rahe ho to nahi nahi mere ko bol refund abhi maine baat ki thi kuch time pehle bhi usne bola tha unhone bola tha helpline number pe call kiya tha maine.
Executive: Main ek baar team se baat kar leti hu theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states no leads converted in 4-5 months.

- Justdial leads show as expired when clicked.

- States that clients do not respond after calling.

- Wants a refund.



Resolution:

- Executive verified GST verified buyleads are showing.

- Executive stated refund is not possible.

- Executive offered Google Meet to explain filters.

- Executive will discuss the refund with the team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss the refund with the team.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, gst, catalog
